passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 2.9%. At the start of battle, increase Attack by 15%. Lasts for 3 turns.

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 2.9%. At the start of battle, increase Attack by 17.5%. Lasts for 3 turns.
